function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Passengers declare a majority of factors as important for their comfort in public transport, indicating a potential risk of transmission of contagious diseases from other passengers.","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease transmission in public transport.","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene measures and social distancing protocols in public transport vehicles.","Technologies":"Use of air filtration systems and contactless payment methods to reduce transmission risk.","People":"Passengers using public transport.","Owner":"Transport authorities and operators."},{"Description":"Passengers identify other passengers as a key factor in feeling safe in public transport, suggesting a risk of contagious disease transmission from other passengers.","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease transmission in public transport.","Mitigation":"Enforce mask-wearing requirements and reduce vehicle capacity to allow for physical distancing.","Technologies":"Implementation of contact tracing and monitoring systems to identify potential exposure in public transport.","People":"Passengers using public transport.","Owner":"Transport authorities and operators."},{"Description":"Existence of CCTV systems is deemed least important for feeling safe in public transport, potentially indicating a risk of inadequate surveillance for safety and hygiene practices.","Impact":"Increased risk of safety and hygiene breaches in public transport vehicles.","Mitigation":"Enhance surveillance systems and introduce regular cleaning and disinfection schedules for public transport vehicles.","Technologies":"Installation of advanced CCTV systems with real-time monitoring and recording capabilities.","People":"Passengers using public transport.","Owner":"Transport authorities and operators."}]}
